Section.name: About GIST
Section.description:
Geethanjali Institute of Science and Technology was established in the year 2008 at Gangavaram village near Nellore in a serene and green environment to impart quality and modern engineering education to the students. Located in a picturesque lush landscape amidst aesthetic ambience near Nellore, it provides right teaching-learning environment. The four year undergraduate programme leads to the degree of Bachelor of Technology. It is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur and is ISO certified (9001:2008). It is affiliated to All India Council for Technical Education.
